content.html: MOVIE PITCH: Dragons re-emerge in modern day Britain but, thanks to a long forgotten prophecy, “only those who are knighted can slay a dragon”. So it’s Helen Mirren, Ian McKellen and others, playing themselves, fighting dragons. Yes?
content.value:
MOVIE PITCH:

Dragons re-emerge in modern day Britain but, thanks to a long forgotten prophecy, “only those who are knighted can slay a dragon”. 

So it’s Helen Mirren, Ian McKellen and others, playing themselves, fighting dragons. 

Yes?
